author: Staff Reporter
text:
Veterinary College and Research Institute here has called upon farmers and entrepreneurs to utilise the dairy plant established on its premises last year.

In a press release, the dean L. Gunaseelan said that a well-established dairy plant is functioning on the premises for the past one year. Farmers and entrepreneurs can utilise the plant for preparation of ice cream, flavoured milk, masala buttermilk, peda, panner and other items for commercial purpose at low cost in a hygienic manner. The dean said that farmers and entrepreneurs can utilise the opportunity and increase their income level.

For further details contact, The Professor and Head, Department of Dairy Science, Veterinary College and Research Institute, Namakkal either directly or through phone at 04286 -266491, 266492, 266493.
title: ‘Utilise dairy plant’
